title: COVID-19 and Travel
description: We want you (and others) to stay safe during your travels. Planning for travel is especially important if you are going to be seeing family and friends who might not be vaccinated yet, or are at high risk for COVID-19 complications if they would get infected.
sitename: Student Health - The University of Iowa
cleaned_text: We want you (and others) to stay safe during your travels. Planning for travel is especially important if you are going to be seeing family and friends who might not be vaccinated yet, or are at high risk for COVID-19 complications if they would get infected. Don't bring illness home to your family or your community. Make a plan to get VACCINATED now- Student Health has Pfizer BioNTech vaccine in stock- call us at 319-335-8394 to get scheduled. Vaccines are plentiful in the community as well, and many pharmacies can do walk-in vaccinations without an appointment. Take this important step! Call our Nurseline at 319-335-9704 if you need a test for travel to discuss options. You may be able to use the [free take home test kit,](https://idph.iowa.gov/News/ArtMID/646/ArticleID/158429/IDPH-and-SHL-Announce-At-Home-Testing-Option) which we have available for pick up/drop off at Student Health. Once home, [follow the CDC guidance for safe activities based on vaccination and health status](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/daily-life-coping/participate-in-activities.html).
